snippet: The Ravens’ Ray Rice has been remarkably sure-handed in regular-season games, but has five fumbles in eight playoff games, including two last Sunday against the Colts.
abstract: Baltimore Ravens running back Ray Rice has five fumbles in eight playoff games, including two in latest playoff game against Indianapolis Colts; acknowledges that he needs to be smarter with his runs.
lead_paragraph: The Ravens’ Ray Rice has been remarkably sure-handed in regular-season games, but has five fumbles in eight playoff games, including two last Sunday against the Colts.

headline.seo: Fumbler? Ravens’ Rice Says, Hold On
headline.main: Fumbler? Hold On, Ravens’ Rice Says
headline.print_headline: Fumbler? Hold On, Ravens’ Rice Says
